description.displayText:
Maria worked for me as a secretary and she also cleaned my home. Maria had a positive attitude and was one of best employees. She was eager to learn, loyal and an asset to my company. She was always on time and showed to be trustworthy and was able to multitask on many different levels in the office. As a housekeeper, she was thorough and took great care of my home. I could trust her completely with my personal belongings.  Maria would be an asset to any company or individual that employs her.  

Andrew Stocker.
description.originalText:

description.displayText: It is my distinct pleasure to write a few words about my lifelong friend Maria. We've know each other since the fifth grade and cherished each others friendship. She is an honest, kind, considerate and empathetic person. Having raised two daughters, she has demonstrated the ability to guide and nurture these young women to successful completion of college and the beginning of professional careers. Maria has been instrumental in implementing a paradigm in the compassionate caring of special needs children over the course of several years. Without reservation, I recommend Maria for any opportunity presented by your organization.
